LanguageData.Fluffy.MusicManager.LockWidgetPosition.T: When locked, the player widget cannot be moved. Disable to drag the widget into a new location.
LanguageData.Fluffy.MusicManager.Columns.Name.Label: Name
LanguageData.Fluffy.MusicManager.Columns.Name.Tooltip: Click to sort by name.\n\nNote: names may not always be sensible, as they are usually not visible.
LanguageData.Fluffy.MusicManager.Columns.Length.Label: Length
LanguageData.Fluffy.MusicManager.Columns.TimeOfDay.To: Click to sort by the time of day this song is allowed to play. Alt-click to filter visible songs by the time of day they are allowed to play. Shift-click to mass assign allowed time of day for visible songs.
LanguageData.Fluffy.MusicManager.Columns.Tense.Label: War & Peace
LanguageData.Fluffy.MusicManager.Columns.Tense.Toolti: Click to sort by songs for war and peace. Alt-click to filter visible songs by songs for war and peace. Shift-click to mass assign war and peace for visible songs.
LanguageData.Fluffy.MusicManager.Columns.Seasons.Tool: Click to sort by the seasons this song is allowed to play. Alt-click to filter visible songs by the seasons they are allowed to play. Shift-click to mass assign allowed seasons for visible songs.
LanguageData.Fluffy.MusicManager.Columns.SongDisabled: Click to sort by whether the song is universally disabled or not. Shift-click to mass enable or disable visible songs.
LanguageData.Fluffy.MusicManager.Filtered: This column has an active filter.
LanguageData.Fluffy.MusicManager.Sorted: The table is sorted by this column.
LanguageData.Fluffy.MusicManager.SongIntervalPeace.Ti: The interval between songs when there is no danger.
LanguageData.Fluffy.MusicManager.SongIntervalWar.Tip: The interval between songs when there is danger.
